explains: n. [电子] 合成器；合成者

sentences.en: Now he can only communicate through a voice synthesizer.
sentences.cn: 如今他只能通过声音合成器来进行交流。

sentences.en: I had a four-track and a synthesizer then.
sentences.cn: 我有一个四轨录音机和合成器。

sentences.en: The scientists had to use a computerized synthesizer to generate speech at this speed.
sentences.cn: 科学家们用1台电脑合成器以这样的速度生成语言。
